law.catch_line: Official timer not to announce false time.
law.text: No official timer at any horse race shall announce willfully and falsely a slower or faster time than that actually accomplished by a horse.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 10, effective March 30, 1992. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1328.
